title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Nelly Hotchkiss, December 17, 1862
summary: Jedediah Hotchkiss describes for his daughter Nelly the Battle of Fredericksburg, tents for soldiers, local technique of "wattle" fencemaking, and a local graveyard.
keywords: Battle Description, Family, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Education, Patriotism, American Civil War
